headline.main: Israeli PM Vows to Remove Arafat Street Sign in Arab Town
headline.print_headline: Israeli PM Vows to Remove Arafat Street Sign in Arab Town

lead_paragraph: Israel's prime minister has vowed to change a street name in an Arab town honoring the late Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat.
snippet: Israel's prime minister has vowed to change a street name in an Arab town honoring the late Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat....
